name: Adna (geekairbus)
description:
Adna is our Second Year final project

In Adna, our contemplative game, you'll play a old spirit which lost her story. You have to resolve riddle to advance and find the memory fragments hidden in the game, to help you, you can use the help of some Will-o the wisp with your spirit power.

Studio Fog :

dev :
